description: This file defines a parameterized class 'DeviceNameProvider' in the package 'com.comcast.xh.zith.shell'. The class extends 'ValueProviderBase' and provides a method to retrieve all device names of a specific type from a mock Zigbee core, likely for shell completion or device management purposes.

classes.name: DeviceNameProvider
classes.description: A generic class that provides device name values for devices of type T, extending ValueProviderBase. It retrieves device names from a mock Zigbee core instance based on device class.

methods.name: DeviceNameProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a specific device class to fetch device names for.

methods.name: getAllPossibleValues
methods.description: Retrieves all device names of the specified device type from the mock Zigbee core, used to supply possible values for a method parameter.
